aircraft.value: Kestrel Patrol - AC-6369-297 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Sensor fusion algorithm anomaly. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 23/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 26/02/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 28/02/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 26/02/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 29/02/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
